attributes.review: This app is terrible, nothing works. It literally shut off my electricity and my wifi stopped working as soon as I downloaded it. I think this app is a hoax and it set up to track all of our steps. Do not recommend. Keep your iPhone great and don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Terrible!!!

attributes.review: I was so excited to download my presidents app but i was so sad when i opened it. It asked me if i wanted notifications on and then it asked me for my phone number. like i have a boyfriend!! so rude. So if you are married or are in a relationship do not get this app or your mans will be super jealousss👀👀👀
attributes.title: Do not recommend!!

attributes.review: This app literally made me puke my insides out and destroyed me into little tiny bits. I don’t understand how it did this but I would never wish this app on my worst enemy. This app is so slow and lags and has no flaaaavor. All I see is orange on it and I can’t stand that color.
attributes.title: Mad me want to go jump off a cliff

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my sane President and it glitched out my whole phone???? 😔 I had to go to the apple store in the middle of a PANDEMIC and buy myself a whole new $1000 phone.😭😭😭😭 My phone was fried because of this app. I don’t recommend at all. I’m surprised it’s not shut down yet. 😤😤😤
attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus

attributes.review: This app just spreads propaganda and miss information, there are no credible sources or opinions. Not to mention the horrible graphics and the amount of space it took up on my phone. I would never recommend this to someone who’s trying to keep up with the elections.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: You should not get this it took over 4 days to download and when it finally finished downloading most of my other games and apps were gone. This is not the app for anyone who loves the apps they have already. I HIGHLY recommend to not get this
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app is horrible i didnt want it to let my notifications on and it kept asking me that then when it finally finished it started asking me for my phone number this app is HORRIBLE and i feel as if trump will end up tryna track you Thanks for reading and DONT GET THE APP
attributes.title: Don recommend

attributes.review: So I got the app and as soon as it downloaded my phone crashed and I had to  go get it fixed this app has a bug and it’s horrible it’s so slow and it slows down the rest of my phone, honestly I get more information from tik tok and instagram then this stupid app
attributes.title: NEVER GETTING AGAIN

attributes.review: Worst. App. Ever. It took a week to start downloading finally got the app on my phone after a month then once I entered the app it hacked my phone took my information and sold my info to 3rd persons sellers now I get phone calls all day from unknown numbers. Save yourself and don’t get this app.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. Kept crashing. Finally when I could open it, an orange Cheeto asked to scoop up my identity, my location, and control of my phone's Bluetooth function. It told me that if I didn’t surrender the data that I should go back to where I came from.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
